Package com.gwt.ss.client.exceptions

Exception Summary
GwtAccessDeniedException Denote Server side occur AccessDeniedException
表示主機端發生拒絕訪問異常
GwtAccountExpiredException Denote Server side occur AccountExpiredException 表示主機端發生賬戶中過期失效異常
GwtAccountStatusException Denote Server side occur AccountStatusException 表示主機端發生帳戶狀態異常
GwtAuthenticationException Denote Server side occur AuthenticationException
表示主機端發生授權異常
GwtBadCredentialsException Denote Server side occur BadCredentialsException  when login credential incorrect.
GwtCredentialsExpiredException Denote Server side occur CredentialsExpiredException 表示主機端發生全權證書過期異常
GwtDisabledException Denote Server side occur DisabledException 表示主機端發生殘疾人異常
GwtLockedException Denote Server side occur LockedException 表示主機端發生鎖定異常
GwtSecurityException Denote server side security exception occurrence
表示主機端發生安全性事務異常
GwtSessionAuthenticationException Denote Server side occur SessionAuthenticationException
表示主機端發生會議驗證異常
GwtUsernameNotFoundException Denote Server side occur UsernameNotFoundException 表示主機端發生用戶名未找到出錯
